I've been studying/reading about the Shinsengumi for a few years now. I rea=
lized over that time, that it was become a very popular subject for modern =
culture/entertainment. 

I have read/watched many different representations=
 of the Shinsengumi. I really have enjoyed them all. Then I found this: 

h=
ttp://www.mangafox.com/manga/shinsengumi_jingishou_asagi/

This manga seems=
 really great. I like that they address life as the Shinsengumi was forming=
 & coming under the leadership of Kondo-san, Hijikata-san, & Yamanami-san. =

This manga seems to have been dropped as a project for English translation=
s. I know it has 5 volumes published in Japan, but I can't seem to find any=
 way to get my hands on this manga. 

I hope that this post complies with t=
his community's posting regulations. If not, please let me know. 
If anyone=
 does have news on this manga, I would really be grateful! I'm always looki=
ng for new material, even in Japanese. :)
